post_detail.description:
Challenge:

ClickFire Media created banners for BBDO and their client, AT&T which ran on Engadget.com during the 2012 Consumer Electronics Show.

Execution:

Using Flash, CFM developed a banner ad, which showcased a different top-notch mobile developer for each day of the Consumer Electronics Show. A micro-site, which was compatible with desktop computers and mobile devices, was developed that allowed applicants wishing to be featured in the banner and site to apply. All the micro-site submissions were then automatically sent to a CMS, which was custom built by CFM to manage the campaign. This CMS served as a submission review tool for the submitted content as well as a control panel to swap out the featured developer and manage the previous winners gallery on the banner and micro-site.
post_detail.title: AT&T CES Banners
